about_me_description: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Igersheim. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about_me_location: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site and remotely.
about_me_bulb: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about_me_puzzle: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to reduce complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and realize your visions.
my_skills_text: I have skills in building projects using various frontend technologies and concepts.
my_skills_feel_free: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
portfolio_text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
reference_patrick: Tobias is an excellent team player who always contributes to efficient collaboration through his excellent communication skills. His extensive expertise helps the team to solve even complex tasks quickly and professionally.
reference_david: I was extremely impressed by Tobias' open, knowledgeable manner. With him I got to know and appreciate a colleague with whom I would like to do something with after work.
project_description_join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project_description_epl: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
project_description_dabubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
contact_text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact_form_pp_text_2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
